name: Diomira
description:
There's a bunch of chests placed around the map. You open the chests to get points. You win when you open all 61 chests. You lose when a ghost touches you.

Point reward for opening chests starts at 60 and decreases by 1 every second, but resets each time you open a chest. This should incentivize being fast and taking risks.

A strange project but I had fun making it, hopefully someone enjoys it.

Controls:
WASD - movement
R - restart
ESCAPE - exit

BUILD INFO:
Windows works. Linux should work. Mac is untested.
